desktops
********


Description
===========

Create and manage cloud-hosted desktops which can be accessed from a
web browser or installed client.


Available Commands
==================

* desktop

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * start

  * stop

  * update

* desktop-pool

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * list-desktops

  * list-volumes

  * start

  * stop

  * update

* work-request

  * cancel

  * get

  * list

  * *list-errors*

  * *list-logs*
